gr::limesdr::sink:
Constructor Specific Documentation:

Return a shared_ptr to a new instance of sink.

To avoid accidental use of raw pointers, sink's constructor is private. limesdr::sink::make is the public interface for creating new instances.

Args:
    serial : Device serial number. Cannot be left blank.
    channel_mode : Channel and mode selection A(1), B(2), (A+B)MIMO(3).
    filename : Path to file if file switch is turned on.
    length_tag_name : Name of stream burst length tag
gr::limesdr::sink::set_nco: Set NCO (numerically controlled oscillator). By selecting NCO frequency configure NCO. When NCO frequency is 0, NCO is off.
gr::limesdr::sink::set_gain: Set the combined gain value in dB
gr::limesdr::sink::set_sample_rate: Set the same sample rate for both channels.
gr::limesdr::sink::make:
Constructor Specific Documentation:

Return a shared_ptr to a new instance of sink.

To avoid accidental use of raw pointers, sink's constructor is private. limesdr::sink::make is the public interface for creating new instances.

Args:
    serial : Device serial number. Cannot be left blank.
    channel_mode : Channel and mode selection A(1), B(2), (A+B)MIMO(3).
    filename : Path to file if file switch is turned on.
    length_tag_name : Name of stream burst length tag

device_handler::error: Print device error and close all devices.
device_handler::get_device: Get device connection handler in order to configure it.
device_handler::open_device: Connect to the device and create singletone.
device_handler::check_blocks: Check what blocks are used for single device.
device_handler::set_samp_rate: Set the same sample rate for both channels.
device_handler::set_oversampling: Set oversampling value for both channels
device_handler::set_rf_freq: Set RF frequency of both channels (RX and TX separately).
device_handler::set_gain: Set the combined gain value in dB This function computes and sets the optimal gain values of various amplifiers that are present in the device based on desired gain value in dB.
device_handler::set_nco: Set NCO (numerically controlled oscillator). By selecting NCO frequency configure NCO. When NCO frequency is 0, NCO is off.
device_handler::set_rfe_device: Sets up LimeRFE device pointer so that automatic channel configuration could be made
device_handler::update_rfe_channels: Assigns configured LimeSDR channels to LimeRFE for automatic channel switching
gr::limesdr::rfe: GNURadio block to control LimeRFE boards.
gr::limesdr::rfe::set_notch: Enable or disable AM/FM notch filter
gr::limesdr::sink_impl::set_nco: Set NCO (numerically controlled oscillator). By selecting NCO frequency configure NCO. When NCO frequency is 0, NCO is off.
gr::limesdr::sink_impl::set_gain: Set the combined gain value in dB
gr::limesdr::sink_impl::set_sample_rate: Set the same sample rate for both channels.
gr::limesdr::source_impl::set_nco: Set NCO (numerically controlled oscillator). By selecting NCO frequency configure NCO. When NCO frequency is 0, NCO is off.
gr::limesdr::source_impl::set_gain: Set the combined gain value in dB
gr::limesdr::source_impl::set_sample_rat: Set the same sample rate for both channels.
